name: Hardwood Rivals
description:
It's time for basketball! The sequel to Basketball Time is back and better than ever. Hardwood Rivals introduces revamped shot mechanics and lets you customize your own player and compete for the top of the leaderboards. Challenge your friends ONLINE and see who has the best shooting skills!

FEATURES:
- Battle your friends ONLINE in HORSE or PIG
- Customize your team name, colors, and player features
- Level up and unlock hats, uniforms and accessories with card rewards
- Five different game modes
- Shoot the ball with two different controls types
- Play in multiple basketball court locations
- Over 30 teams to customize and compete against
- Share replays of your highest scores
- Real 2D physics
- Leaderboards and Achievements

Have any issues or suggestions? I'd love to hear about your experience! Contact me at khoa@koalitygame.com or follow me on Twitter at @KoalityGame.
